titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2002
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2002 (sic) - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.
